scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(ðŸ““): Update CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(ðŸ““): Update CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(ðŸ““): Update CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push --tags
